text: Karol Zając (19 May 1913 - 18 May 1965) was a Polish alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:1965 deaths Category:Polish male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Poland Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zakopane
title: Karol Zając
